    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_e08c6fdaef00f6503a99d874b1e2ba29a772c599</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Barley grains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerste Körner</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Grains d'orge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Grões da cevada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grani dell'orzo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σιτάρια κριθαριού</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Granos de la cebada</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the seeds of a barley plant. Malt sugar used to make beer comes from the starch of these grains.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">barley seeds</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">malt sugar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Startwerte für 
Zufallsgenerator einer Gerstenpflanze. Malzzucker verwendete, 
Bier zu bilden kommt von der Stärke dieser Körner.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les graines d'une 
plante d'orge. Le sucre de malt employé pour faire la bière 
vient de l'amidon de ces grains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as sementes de uma 
planta de cevada. O açúcar de malt usou-se fazer a cerveja vem
do starch destas grões.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i semi di una pianta 
di orzo. Il maltosio ha usato fare la birra viene dall'amido di 
questi grani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τους σπόρους 
εγκαταστάσεων κριθαριού. Η ζάχαρη βύνης που χρησιμοποιείται
για να κάνει την μπύρα προέρχεται από το άμυλο αυτών των 
σιταριών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los gérmenes de una 
cebada. El azúcar de malta usada para hacer la cerveza viene 
del almidón de estos granos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gerste Startwerte für Zufallsgenerator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Malzzucker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Stärke</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">graines d'orge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">bière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sucre de malt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">amidon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sementes da cevada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">cerveja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">açúcar de malt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">starch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μπύρα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ζάχαρη βύνης</string>
          </keyword>
